messages:
So, you are here! 
 What a journey it has been! 🛤️

If you don’t know: 
 this is the last challenge you will face! ⚔️

This level has high stakes: 
 this is the FINAL, 
 the final to determine the best player! 🏆

The champion's trophy belongs 
 to the player who defeated 
 all their competition!

This is why you will face 
 the greatest, strongest, 
 and fastest competitor! 💪

Actually, this is a boss fight 
 so obviously your opponent 
 is smart too! 😈

3 goals behind, 
 One fast goalkeeper, 
 And three minutes... 
 Will that be enough? ⏳

Beat your competitor! 
 For glory, 
 For the champion’s cup! 🏅
